original_title: Sergio Vieira de Mello: En Route to Baghdad
overview: A documentary that details the life and humanitarian work of Sergio Vieira de Mello, a man who endeavored to bring peace and security to countries like Rwanda, Mozambique, Cambodia and East Timor. de Mello was among the people killed in a bombing attack on the UN Headquarters in Baghdad on August 19, 2003.
title: Sergio Vieira de Mello: En Route to Baghdad
